synopsis.text: And so begins the whirlwind life of Tasuke Shichiri, a typical teenager living solo while his globetrotting parents scour the world for ancient relics. One day, a mysterious hoop and flute arrive from his father, and with them, two celestial spirits materialize: Shaorin, a moon goddess sworn to safeguard her master, and Ruuan, a sun spirit determined to bring joy to Tasuke's life. But these divine protectors are far from perfect, and their rivalry brings more chaos than calm. As they compete for Tasuke's favor, their overzealous attempts at protection and happiness leave a trail of destruction in their wake. Brace yourself for a wild ride filled with laughter, mayhem, and otherworldly adventures in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
